name: Lost (itch) (orico2007)
description:
HOW TO PLAY LOST:

  • HOW TO PLAY

to walk w,s,a,d

to run hold Shift

to jump press Space

to hit / shoot press Left mouse click

to aim Press Right mouse click

to open inventory press Tab

  • MODES

You have 2 modes:

Survival - that you can survive and get tools and thing by your self

Creative - that you can get things from the list below the inventory

  • DUNGEONS

In the worls there are some abandoned houses in them there are animals and zombies

if you kill them all you can go up stairs and get from the chests random loot

  • MOVING ISLANDS

you can move to the next island by crafting a boat after two boats you done all the game

  • COOKING

you can smelt and cook things and there are two things that you can craft that will help you

campfire - you can cook there only food (meat)

smelter - you can cook there all food and tools

  • ANVIL

with anvil you can rpair your tools by adding some products

  • BUILDING MENU
  • SAVE GAME

you can save your game by pressing Right Alt

and load it when you enter to the game

GOOD LUCK!
